tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_description TEXT,
    product_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    production_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR(64) UNIQUE,
    PRIMARY KEY (product_id)
)

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    qc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    qc_status VARCHAR(100),
    qc_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product(id)
);

CREATE TABLE quality_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    check_date TIMESTAMP,
    quality_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE quality_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    check_date DATE,
    check_result BOOLEAN,
    inspector_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    shipment_date DATE,
    source_location VARCHAR,
    destination_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE product (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    description STRING,
    manufacturer STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE batch (
    batch_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID REFERENCES product(id),
    quantity INT,
    production_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE,
    blockchain_hash STRING
)

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    qc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    batch_id UUID REFERENCES batch(batch_id),
    qc_result BOOLEAN,
    qc_date DATE,
    qc_inspector STRING
)

CREATE TABLE inspector (
    inspector_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    role STRING
)

CREATE TABLE location (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    address STRING,
    city STRING,
    country STRING
)
